trans-unit.source: Biden to nominate Janet Yellen as US treasury secretary

seg-source.mrk: Biden to nominate Janet Yellen as US treasury secretary

trans-unit.source: Published

seg-source.mrk: Published

trans-unit.source: 1 hour ago

seg-source.mrk: 1 hour ago

trans-unit.source: Share

seg-source.mrk: Share

trans-unit.source: IMAGE COPYRIGHTREUTERS

seg-source.mrk: IMAGE COPYRIGHTREUTERS

trans-unit.source: image captionJanet Yellen's appointment needs to be confirmed by the Senate

seg-source.mrk: image captionJanet Yellen's appointment needs to be confirmed by the Senate

trans-unit.source: US President-elect Joe Biden has named ex-Federal Reserve chair Janet Yellen as his nominee for treasury secretary.

seg-source.mrk: US President-elect Joe Biden has named ex-Federal Reserve chair Janet Yellen as his nominee for treasury secretary.

trans-unit.source: If confirmed by the Senate, she would be the first woman ever to hold the post.

seg-source.mrk: If confirmed by the Senate, she would be the first woman ever to hold the post.

trans-unit.source: She was among several women chosen for top economic positions. The Biden transition team said others were set to break racial barriers if confirmed.

seg-source.mrk: She was among several women chosen for top economic positions.
The Biden transition team said others were set to break racial barriers if confirmed.

trans-unit.source: Mr Biden has pledged to build a diverse administration. He earlier appointed an all-female senior press team.

seg-source.mrk: Mr Biden has pledged to build a diverse administration.
He earlier appointed an all-female senior press team.

trans-unit.source: Mr Biden's transition team said his picks for senior economic roles would help "lift America out of the current economic downturn and build back better".

seg-source.mrk: Mr Biden's transition team said his picks for senior economic roles would help "lift America out of the current economic downturn and build back better".

trans-unit.source: Mr Biden has also announced the formation of a Presidential Inaugural Committee ahead of his swearing-in on 20 January. The committee will be responsible for organising inauguration-related activities.

seg-source.mrk: Mr Biden has also announced the formation of a Presidential Inaugural Committee ahead of his swearing-in on 20 January.
The committee will be responsible for organising inauguration-related activities.

trans-unit.source: Who is Janet Yellen?

seg-source.mrk: Who is Janet Yellen?

trans-unit.source: Ms Yellen had been�widely tipped for the nomination in media reports prior to Monday's announcement.

seg-source.mrk: Ms Yellen had been�widely tipped for the nomination in media reports prior to Monday's announcement.

trans-unit.source: The 74-year-old economist has served as head of America's central bank and as a top economics adviser to former President Bill Clinton.

seg-source.mrk: The 74-year-old economist has served as head of America's central bank and as a top economics adviser to former President Bill Clinton.

trans-unit.source: She is credited with helping steer the economic recovery after the 2007 financial crisis and ensuing recession.

seg-source.mrk: She is credited with helping steer the economic recovery after the 2007 financial crisis and ensuing recession.

trans-unit.source: As chair of the US Federal Reserve, Ms Yellen was known for focusing more attention on the impact of the bank's policies on workers and the costs of America's rising inequality.

seg-source.mrk: As chair of the US Federal Reserve, Ms Yellen was known for focusing more attention on the impact of the bank's policies on workers and the costs of America's rising inequality.

trans-unit.source: Donald Trump bucked Washington tradition when he opted not to appoint Ms Yellen to a second four-year term at the Fed. Starting with Bill Clinton in the 1990s, presidents kept on bank leaders appointed by their predecessors in an effort to de-politicise the bank.

seg-source.mrk: Donald Trump bucked Washington tradition when he opted not to appoint Ms Yellen to a second four-year term at the Fed.
Starting with Bill Clinton in the 1990s, presidents kept on bank leaders appointed by their predecessors in an effort to de-politicise the bank.

trans-unit.source: Since leaving the bank in 2018, Ms Yellen has spoken out about climate change and the need for Washington to do more to shield the US economy from the impact of the coronavirus pandemic.

seg-source.mrk: Since leaving the bank in 2018, Ms Yellen has spoken out about climate change and the need for Washington to do more to shield the US economy from the impact of the coronavirus pandemic.

trans-unit.source: In a tweet following Monday's announcement, Ms Yellen said: "We face great challenges as a country right now. To recover, we must restore the American dream - a society where each person can rise to their potential and dream even bigger for their children.

seg-source.mrk: In a tweet following Monday's announcement, Ms Yellen said: "We face great challenges as a country right now.
To recover, we must restore the American dream - a society where each person can rise to their potential and dream even bigger for their children.

trans-unit.source: "As Treasury Secretary, I will work every day towards rebuilding that dream for all."

seg-source.mrk: "As Treasury Secretary, I will work every day towards rebuilding that dream for all."

trans-unit.source: What about the other names?

seg-source.mrk: What about the other names?

trans-unit.source: The Biden transition team said the senior economic team is set to include "several historic trailblazers".

seg-source.mrk: The Biden transition team said the senior economic team is set to include "several historic trailblazers".

trans-unit.source: Picks include former Obama administration official Wally Adeyemo as deputy treasury secretary and economist Cecilia Rouse as chair of the Council of Economic Advisers. If confirmed, Mr Biden's team said both would be the first African Americans in those roles.

seg-source.mrk: Picks include former Obama administration official Wally Adeyemo as deputy treasury secretary and economist Cecilia Rouse as chair of the Council of Economic Advisers.
If confirmed, Mr Biden's team said both would be the first African Americans in those roles.

trans-unit.source: Mr Biden will nominate Neera Tanden, who worked with the Obama administration on the creation of Obamacare, to head the Office of Management and Budget. If confirmed, she would be the first woman of colour and first South Asian American to lead the agency.

seg-source.mrk: Mr Biden will nominate Neera Tanden, who worked with the Obama administration on the creation of Obamacare, to head the Office of Management and Budget.
If confirmed, she would be the first woman of colour and first South Asian American to lead the agency.

trans-unit.source: IMAGE COPYRIGHTREUTERS

seg-source.mrk: IMAGE COPYRIGHTREUTERS

trans-unit.source: image captionNeera Tanden's social media comments have drawn controversy

seg-source.mrk: image captionNeera Tanden's social media comments have drawn controversy

trans-unit.source: But she is likely to be the hardest confirmation fight in the Senate.

seg-source.mrk: But she is likely to be the hardest confirmation fight in the Senate.

trans-unit.source: Neera Tanden pick draws controversy

seg-source.mrk: Neera Tanden pick draws controversy

trans-unit.source: Joe Biden might have his first big presidential appointment fight on his hands.

seg-source.mrk: Joe Biden might have his first big presidential appointment fight on his hands.

trans-unit.source: The president-elect's choice of Neera Tanden, a long-time Democratic operative, to be his White House budget office director - which requires Senate confirmation - is getting sharp attacks from the left and the right.

seg-source.mrk: The president-elect's choice of Neera Tanden, a long-time Democratic operative, to be his White House budget office director - which requires Senate confirmation - is getting sharp attacks from the left and the right.

trans-unit.source: Grass-roots liberals don't like Tanden because of her outspoken criticism of the party's progressive movement and its standard-bearer, former presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders. Conservatives don't like her because of her personal jabs at their leaders.

seg-source.mrk: Grass-roots liberals don't like Tanden because of her outspoken criticism of the party's progressive movement and its standard-bearer, former presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders.
Conservatives don't like her because of her personal jabs at their leaders.

trans-unit.source: And Tanden's views are well-documented, given that some of her most incendiary comments came on social media.

seg-source.mrk: And Tanden's views are well-documented, given that some of her most incendiary comments came on social media.

trans-unit.source: Concern about problematic tweets might seem quaint after four years of Donald Trump's presidency, of course. And the Senate's 2018 confirmation of Ric Grenell - a notorious Twitter provocateur - to be Trump's ambassador to Germany suggests that inflammatory social media posts are not by themselves disqualifying.

seg-source.mrk: Concern about problematic tweets might seem quaint after four years of Donald Trump's presidency, of course.

And the Senate's 2018 confirmation of Ric Grenell - a notorious Twitter provocateur - to be Trump's ambassador to Germany suggests that inflammatory social media posts are not by themselves disqualifying.

trans-unit.source: Grenell, however, had a Republican majority supporting his nomination. Pending the outcome of Georgia's Senate races, Biden could face a chamber controlled by the opposition - and a left flank disinclined to help.

seg-source.mrk: Grenell, however, had a Republican majority supporting his nomination.
Pending the outcome of Georgia's Senate races, Biden could face a chamber controlled by the opposition - and a left flank disinclined to help.

trans-unit.source: Biden has touted his ability to work with the Senate to get things done. If he wants Tanden, this will be an early test of his skills.

seg-source.mrk: Biden has touted his ability to work with the Senate to get things done.
If he wants Tanden, this will be an early test of his skills.
